document_data.caption: A map showing Hassantyr's Street and surroundings in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Hassantyr's Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Hassantyr's Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Hassantyr's Street was located in the west section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] and the eastern side of the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. Hassantyr's Street originated in the west on [[Sul Street]] in the Sea ward where it branched due east, crossing into the North Ward and eventually ending on [[Saerdoun Street]] near the outer city wall. Hassantyr's Street also connected with [[Shield Street]], [[Copper Street]], the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]], [[Ilzantil Street]], [[Vhezoar Street]], [[Brondar's Way]], [[Whaelgond Way]], [[Ussilbran Street]], and [[Nindabar Street]].
